text:
Aur bhai aditya kaisa hai tu.Hamari pehli mulakat orientation ke time hee hui thi. Teri meethi awaaj ka aaj bhi kayal hun tere sone ke bahane se aaj bhi ghayal hu me. jo inferno me 4-4 medal jeet jaye wo ha rajput. jo dhawal ke saath room share kar sake wo rajput. Jo antaragni me ladki patane ke chakkar me ek aur chakkar ground ka ek aur chakkar kat le wo rajput .tumne me to bahu sankari dikhte ho but kuldeep ke baad sabase jyada hawas tummhe hee bhari hui ha ye baat mujhe aaj bhi tajoob karwati h.
1st year me galaxy ke to kya hee kahne. Wo yaade hamesha jinda rahegi .
Hamari pehli holi aur deepak mahajan ke nude scene dekh aaj bhi cringe feel ho jaati h.
2nd year me tumhari bandi wali story sunkar aaj bhi hasi aati hai. Please dhawal ko direct reception me hi bulana. aur shaadi pahle hee karlena.
anyways you got love of your life.
Sabse jyada maja aakhir ke dino me hi aya .Nightout,holi,stories,bluff,uno .Sab yaad rakha jayega par last me tumhare jaane par jaane kyun emotional ho gaya mai. 
You are very innocent guy but always remember to take your own stand and stand out from the mob.
Don't get totally influenced by anybody except you.
Best of luck in life. Phir milenge
author: Divyanshu  Sen

text:
Aur bhai dhawal kaisa hai tu. Tu mujhe sabse pahle mila orientation ke time apne bhaiyo me.
Sabse pahle to mai tujhe "bhaiya"  kahkar bula tha kyonki mujhe laga tu S.G h .Pahli bar airstrip pe photo airplanes ke saath photo khichwakar hum dono bahut khush hue the.Shuru me to tu bahut jyada harami lag raha tha jo apne doston ko har dusri baat me gaali deta tha baad me pata chala tu to usse bhi jyada harami hai.
Tera sarcasm aur sense of humor laajwab ha. Suruwat me seniors ke saath interaction me humaari kaman hum dono hee sambhalte the .Wo bakchodi aaj bhi kal ki hi baat lagti ha. Tumhara tamonud ka bhaiyankar roast karna aaj bhi bahut hasa deta ha.
Phir aya takneek ke time tumhara shandar pradarshan. Aj bhi yad hai maine shedir ko kiase yaad kiya tha.
Kya confidence ha tumme yaar. 5 % ki quiz to tune yunhi chod di thi .
Itne bakchodi karke bhi  tumne studies me bahut chapa.
Midsem se lautne ke baad tumhari masturbation ki aadat aaj bhi mujhe bahut hasa rahi hai.
Din me 3 bar muth marne ke bawjood tumne summer camp me six pack abs bana dale.
You have great energy.
2nd year me hum dono ne saath me music class join ki thi. Hope you doing well on the piano aur shubankar maderchod ne guitar ke 9100 de diye hai. tumhari confidence dene par hi mujhi itna confidence aya.
yaad ha wo utsav bhosdika bolke tum mujhe kitna hasa dete the. BBq me treat par bhi  bahut maja aaya. kaash aur bbq treats ho paati.aur yaade ham bator pate.
mujhe aaj bhi music ka exam yaad hai jo humne saath me diya tha.par us phute dhol ki wajah se humne wo bigaad diya. khair mehnat karne apne maje hai.
Ashu jain ka khane ka taste aaj bhi mujhe yaad ha.
sabse majedar hamare last ke 50 din h .i am glad ki mai 7 ko hi aa gaya tha.
Holi par wo rajan ka dance bahut amazing tha. Saath me nightout bulla ,bluff ,uno aur rolls sab yaad rakha jayega.
You have good confidence, intelligence and great emotional quotient
Hope you do well in your music career and life as whole.
Aur likhna chahta tha but abhi rajan aur shubham ka bhi likhna hai. 
Goodbye






Shukriya hal de dil ke lyrics baar baar gaake yaad karane ke liye.Tumhari tarah intellectually strong bande bahut kam hote hain.
author: Divyanshu  Sen

text:
Rajan bhai, late karne ke liye maafi
Mujhe yaad ha hum pahli bar kab mile the. Sayad tumhe yad na ho ,ashiyana hall art of living me jab hame ek dusre me bhagwaan dundhkar ek dusre ko gale milna tha.Mere pale me tu aya tha jis shraddha se tum sabse gale mil rahe the mujhe abhaas ho gaya ki tum bahot aage jaaoge.
Hamari real mulakat hui sociology ke dwara jab hum dono reading room me quiz se pahle ratta laga rahe the aur me kambal leke padhai kar raha tha.
Tab tumhara room majedar or high intellectual people ke saath rehta tha beech beech me nishant aakar ke use wapas thanda kar deta tha.
Tum pure din bhar padhai karke library se aakar mini militia khelte the.
Aakhir me end sem me bhi tere saath sociology padha tha aur saath me hi dono ne paper thukwa liya.
Summer me jab tum ruke the  tab suruwat me to bahut maza aya tha par tune meri bottle me se bottle paani bhar liya tab mujhe pata tum bahut harami prani ho.
Tumhari wo kothe wali aur bhai wali story aaj bhi ache yad ha. Aur tumhare bhai ke sasuma ka dialogue ki "Aaj kal ke jamane me to ye sab chalta hai" Sabse khatarnak dialogue tha.
Ham ne saath me summer of code bhi kiya tha jo kabhi positive aur hardworking experience tha.Usse pata chala ke tum bahut hardworking guy ho.
Second year me jyada baat nahi ho payi. Phir third year me to tu tomanud ka partner ban gaya tha.
Aur third bhi khatarnak gujra .Tumhare medals dekh ke mujhe kabhi kabhi inferiority complex ho jaata tha.
Sabse khatarnak time gujra hamara last ke 50 din Wo holi milan samaroh ,oat ki chat, oat ke rolls aur shake aur jabse important sabka saath tha.
That was very refreshing atmosphere i experienced with you.
I get you as a person who is very hardworking  and natural. Please aise hi rahna
Alvida Dost
author: Divyanshu  Sen

text:
Hello bhai kaise ho tumse me pahli baar mila tha tumhare room me orientation ke time.Tab mujhe tum kaafi dehati lage. parantu mera yah mat bahut jaldi badal gaya jab tum sab mobile aur computer ki bahut saari details discuss karte the aur me universe ke videos dekha karta tha.
1st year ka studies ka gum dono same batch me jhela.
phy 102 mth 101 se suru kar ta 101 aur life 101 sab bahut khatarnak the.
Thanks for helping me out in ta 101.
2nd semester ki chemistry lab to bahut hi khatarnak thi .
Mujhe aaj bhi dhruv ka mc^2 wala dialogue yaad ha
Sabse bakchod time to humara saath 1st year summer me gujra jab deepak aur dhruv ke maje lete the.
Dono ke maje lene par hum dono naye naye level set karte the.
Ek baar deepak aur tamonud bengali ki gpl to leni chahiye thi.
last ke 50 din bahut khatarnak gujre kaash 1 aur saal hum sab saath me rehte.
best of luck in life
author: Divyanshu  Sen
